title: Fort Point National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Online Park Fun Our interactive games introduce you to Golden Gate National Parks and the environmental challenges park rangers tackle. You can have fun while you learn about the wildlife we protect; the ecosystems we restore; and the NPS mission we fulfill. See what actions you would take to save the Mission blue butterfly, track a coyote, or protect an important sand dune.
